Description: Junior Process Operator in the refinery field (EPCL) ENOC Jebel Ali - UAE NationalsAre you a UAE national high school graduate looking for an exciting opportunity to kickstart your career journey? We have a great vacancy waiting just for you!ENOC is searching for bright and motivated UAE national high school graduates who are eager to gain real-world experience in Refinery. This is your chance to work with a dynamic team, learn new skills, and make a positive impact.About the Position:We are delighted to offer our - Technical Training program to UAE Nationals. The program will offer a full salary and run for 3 years with a combination of classroom learning / practical and on the job training in a highly reputed training institute ( PETROFAC ) . You will work on real life process operation-based tasks and will receive full mentoring and coaching support throughout the program . On successful completion of the program, you are expected to be an independent operator with a clearly defined career path.We are looking for motivated, hardworking individuals who have the desire to build a successful career in Process Operation in the Oil & Gas industrySkills
